name: opencode-bonfire
description: OpenCode forgets everything between sessions. Bonfire remembers.

scripts.copy-files: rm -rf files && mkdir -p files && cp -r ../../opencode/agent ../../opencode/command ../../opencode/plugin ../../opencode/skill ../../opencode/tool ../../opencode/opencode.json ../../opencode/package.json files/
scripts.build: bun run copy-files && bun build src/cli.ts --outdir dist --target node
